QuestData.Title: Unseen Fate
QuestData.Description:
Our path is a winding, twisting road full of peril. Yet did you know it can be walked many times? There is an item of great power available to us. It allows us another opportunity, a second chance.
Do you wish to acquire one?
QuestData.LogDescription: Place a work order for a Seal of Broken Fate.

Objectives.Objective: Place a work order for a Seal of Broken Fate
